query:
ALTER TABLE notificationHistory 
  ADD COLUMN smsSent tinyint DEFAULT 0,
  ADD COLUMN smsSentAt timestamp NULL,
  ADD COLUMN smsDeliveryStatus enum('pending','sent','delivered','failed','undelivered') NULL,
  ADD COLUMN smsMessageId varchar(255) NULL
command:
mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway02.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user 3HwZw1vuDqLodBY.root --database hjcHA4SjAwhM6aP28vcAkH --execute ALTER TABLE notificationHistory 
  ADD COLUMN smsSent tinyint DEFAULT 0,
  ADD COLUMN smsSentAt timestamp NULL,
  ADD COLUMN smsDeliveryStatus enum('pending','sent','delivered','failed','undelivered') NULL,
  ADD COLUMN smsMessageId varchar(255) NULL
